profile.verificationMessage: Complete your identity verification to create campaigns and receive payments
profile.verificationFailed: Your verification failed. You must complete the process again to continue.
profile.completeStripeVerification: Complete your Stripe verification to receive payments automatically
profile.noCampaignCreated: You haven't created any campaigns yet
profile.noBeneficiary: You are not a beneficiary of any campaign
profile.countryPaymentDisclaimer:
Changing your country may affect verification options and payment methods
available to you as a beneficiary.
profile.statusNotBeneficiaryMessage: You are not registered as a beneficiary in any campaign. Stripe Connect is only necessary to receive automatic payments as a beneficiary.
profile.statusManualPayMessage: Your country ({{country}}) does not currently support Stripe Connect. Payments will be processed manually when the trigger is activated.
profile.statusVerifiedMessage: Your Stripe Connect account is verified and active. You can receive payments automatically when the trigger is activated.
profile.statusOnboardingMessage: You are in the process of completing your verification. Continue where you left off.
profile.statusPendingMessage: Your verification is pending. Stripe is reviewing your information.
profile.statusRejectedMessage: Your verification was rejected by Stripe. Contact support for more information.
profile.statusRequiredMessage: Complete your Stripe Connect verification to receive payments automatically when the trigger is activated.
profile.beneficiaryCampaignsTitle: Campaigns where you are a beneficiary ({{count}})
profile.infoBoxMessage: Stripe Connect allows you to receive payments automatically in your bank account when the campaign trigger is activated. It is secure, fast and regulated.

kyc.messageVerified: Your identity has been successfully verified. You can now create campaigns and receive donations.
kyc.messageReview: We are reviewing your documents. This may take 1-2 business days. We will notify you when it's ready.
kyc.messageRejected: Some of your documents were rejected. Please review the details and upload them again.
kyc.messagePending: Complete your identity verification to be able to create campaigns and receive donations.
kyc.infoTitle: Why do we verify your identity?
kyc.infoText:
KYC (Know Your Customer) verification is a legal requirement to prevent fraud
and money laundering. Your documents are protected and encrypted.
kyc.introSubtitle: To create campaigns we need to verify your identity
kyc.step1Description: Clear photo of the front of your ID card
kyc.step2Description: Clear photo of the back of your ID card
kyc.step3Description: A photo of yourself to verify your identity
kyc.captureIdFrontInstruction: Place your ID card in the frame and make sure it's clear
kyc.captureIdBackInstruction: Now photograph the back of your ID card
kyc.captureSelfieInstruction: Take a photo of your face. Make sure you have good lighting
kyc.permissionText: We need permission to access the camera
